snippet: General Mills says it had received calls almost daily to bring back the popular cereal, which was discontinued in 2006.
abstract: General Mills says it is reviving its popular French Toast Crunch cereal due to consumer demand.
lead_paragraph: General Mills says it had received calls almost daily to bring back the popular cereal, which was discontinued in 2006.

headline.main: French Toast Crunch Back by Popular Demand
headline.print_headline: French Toast Crunch Back by Popular Demand
